basic.description:
{Basic Archery}

Increases {10%} range damage and cast { Precision } at battle opening for {10} rounds

advanced.description:
{Advanced Archery}

Increases {25%} range damage and cast { Precision } at battle opening for {25} rounds

expert.description:
{Expert Archery}

Increases {50%} range damage and cast { Precision } at battle opening for {50} rounds
